name: Shoot:Top Down Shooter
description:
GAME TOWN
PRESENT;
SHOOT:TOP DOWN SHOOTER GAME
BASIC MOVEMENT ARE
UP
DOWN
RIGHT
LEFT
FUNCTION KEYS
SPACE TO SHOOT 
ENTER TO LOADss
GLOBAL LEFT MOUSE TO SAVE
CONTROL TO QUIT
ESC TO QUIT
F9 FOR SCREENSHOT
F4 TO SWITCH SCREEN
F1 GAME INFORMATION
GAME START
YOU WILL A START GAME MESSAGE THEN CLICK OK.
NEXT YOU SEE AN INFO ABOUT THE GAME PRESS ESC TO SKIP IT THEN THE GAME START.
